main_definition: Por is a conjunction or preposition in Spanish, often used to express purpose, cause, exchange, duration, etc.

meanings_and_examples.example: Estudié por ganar un título. (I studied for the purpose of getting a degree.)

meanings_and_examples.definition: On behalf of or in exchange for
meanings_and_examples.example: Lo hice por ella. (I did it on her behalf.)
Viví en esa casa durante cinco años. (I lived in that house for five years.)
Escribí ese mensaje por correo electrónico. (I wrote that message through email.)
Hablé con él por recomendación de mi jefe. (I spoke with him for the sake of my boss's recommendation.)
